parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the windshield wiper arm can cause reduced visibility while driving in rainy or snowy conditions, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The passenger-side wiper arm gets stuck behind the driver-side wiper arm
both wipers stop working
the wiper arm over-travels and jams
the wiper arm makes a complete 360-degree rotation instead of rocking back and forth.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the windshield wiper motor linkage can cause the wiper arms to malfunction, leading to reduced visibility while driving in rainy or snowy conditions, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The wiper motor linkage is bent
the wiper arm gets stuck behind the other wiper arm
the wiper arm over-travels and jams
the wiper arm makes a complete 360-degree rotation instead of rocking back and forth.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden failure of the factory-installed receiver hitch can cause the towed vehicle to separate from the towing vehicle, leading to potential accidents, damage to property, and risk of injury or fatalities.
symptoms: The receiver hitch breaks off without warning
the towed vehicle separates from the towing vehicle
no visible signs of cracking or metal fatigue prior to the separation.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the entrance door lock cylinder can cause the door to become stuck, making it impossible to enter or exit the vehicle, which can lead to safety risks, especially in emergency situations.
symptoms: The entrance door lock cylinder breaks
the door becomes stuck and cannot be opened or closed
the door lock is inoperable
the door is stuck in the locked or unlocked position.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Improper front-end alignment can cause the vehicle to pull to one side, making it difficult to steer, which can lead to accidents, loss of control, and potential injuries.
symptoms: The vehicle pulls to one side while driving
difficulty steering
uneven tire wear
vibration while driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Manufacturer Dispute and Lack of Warranty Coverage
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The dispute between manufacturers (Ford and Thor) and the lack of warranty coverage can leave customers with costly repairs, inconvenience, and potential safety risks.
symptoms: Manufacturer blame-shifting
lack of warranty coverage
unresponsive customer service
refusal to address safety concerns.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the wiper arm can cause reduced visibility during heavy rain or snow, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The wiper arm travels below the lower portion of the windshield
the wiper arm does not stay in its normal resting place
the wiper blade does not stay on
the driver-side wiper does not function properly
the wiper arm slowly moves farther down past its normal resting place.
